title: What’s the Special Routine Tonight?
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Karin~. I ran out of face serum. Can you lend me some?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Sure. Which one do you want?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Anything would be fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Anything, huh... Do you have any concerns about your skin? Like do you want to fix part of it, or you want it to look more like something else?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Then, something that matches with you would be fine, Karin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, oh you~. Alright, then I’ll show you my special skincare routine. First, use this exfoliating lotion. It removes excess dead skin cells. After that, apply a little bit of argan oil as a primer. People normally put oil last, but it also works well to give your skin a boost. Your skin will absorb this face cream more easily. It uses damask rose extract. This is-...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You’re really passionate and knowledgeable about beauty treatments, huh, Karin! Lanzhu is so impressed! Tell me more!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Wow... That was truly a special skincare routine worthy of its name! That was a good talk. Thank you, Karin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Wait, Lanzhu! We haven’t done anything yet! We’re going to try it now, so wait~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
